Card.name: Alex
Card.Property: Once per turn when you finish a combo with a throw, you may put it in your hand instead of your energy pile. (*) When your effects lower damage to your rival's attacks, increase the amount lowered by 2.

Card.name: Dudley
Card.Property: You cannot play kicks. (*) When you flip an event because you played a punch, draw a card. (*) Anytime you draw an event, you may reveal it and set it.

Card.name: Ibuki
Card.Property: When one of your kicks or weapons hits, your rival keeps -1 cards in his hand during this turn's Discard.

Card.name: Ken
Card.Property: You can play low kicks and low projectiles as high kicks and high projectiles and vice versa. (*) When you play a kick or projectile, you may switch a card in your hand with the top card of your deck.

Card.name: Ryu
Card.Property: Your rival discards +1 card from his deck when your other effects discard cards from his deck. (*) Your first projectile each turn costs -1 energy for each punch in your energy pile.

Card.name: Sean
Card.Property: When your rival blocks a punch or kick, he must discard a card from his hand or take +2 chipping. (*) While your rival has 5 or more energy, cards that go into his energy pile are discarded instead.

Card.name: Twelve
Card.Property: When you flip an event, put it in your energy pile after it finishes. (*) At the start of Battle, you may discard an event in your energy pile to put a weapon from your discard pile into your hand.

Card.name: Busted
Card.Property: Flip when your rival blocks a punch. This attack's chipping gains +X. X = your energy.

Card.name: Fond Memories
Card.Property: Flip when your rival attacks. Put the top card of your discard pile into your hand. Remove this card. (*) Limit 1 per deck.

Card.name: Form of the Mountain
Card.Property: Flip at the start of Battle. Your rival's attacks do -1 damage this step.

Card.name: Killer Bee Recon
Card.Property: STREET FIGHTER ONLY. (*) Flip at the start of Battle. Your rival reveals his hand.

Card.name: Looking Good
Card.Property: Flip when you pass. Your rival reveals his hand. Choose and discard a card in his hand. (*) Limit 1 per deck.

Card.name: Power of a God
Card.Property: Flip when you pass. End this step. (*) Limit 1 per deck.

Card.name: Sensei's Death
Card.Property: Flip when you attack. Discard a rival's face-down card in the arena. (*) Limit 1 per deck.

Card.name: Shadaloo Warrior
Card.Property: Flip when you attack. You may link a punch from this attack.

Card.name: The Master's Teaching
Card.Property: Flip at the start of Discard. You may keep +3 cards in your hand this step.

Card.name: Thuggin
Card.Property: Flip when you attack. Your rival must pay 2 energy before he can block this attack.

Card.name: Uncontrollable Rage
Card.Property: Flip when you play a 0 or 1 cost attack. This attack becomes "high" and "low" and requires your rival to block high and low. He may block it twice.

Card.name: Aerial Combo
Card.Property: HIT- This card stays on the table to be played 1 more time this step. Discard this card the 2nd time this attack finishes or when this step ends,

Card.name: Assist
Card.Property: HIT - Look at and rearrange the top 4 cards of your deck. You may look and rearrange an extra card for each projectile in your energy pile.

Card.name: Back to Back
Card.Property: HIT - Put the top card of your discard pile at the bottom of your deck.

Card.name: Backlash
Card.Property: HIT - If you have a kick in your energy pile, name a card. Your rival reveals his hand and discards any copies of that card in his hand.

Card.name: Basketball Poke
Card.Property: HIT - If linked from a weapon, your rival's attacks cost +1 energy this step.

Card.name: Ceiling Dive
Card.Property: HIT - Your rival's attacks cost +2 energy in his next action.

Card.name: Crouching Fierce Punch
Card.Property: Your rival's first attack in his next action deals no damage if you have 15 or fewer cards in your deck.

Card.name: Crow Kick
Card.Property: HIT - When you link a kick in this combo, discard the top card of your rival's deck.

Card.name: Dark Shoryuken
Card.Property: Pay any amount of energy. For each energy paid, discard the top card of your rival's deck.

Card.name: Dragon Elbow
Card.Property: HIT - Each player discards X cards from the top of his deck. X = the number of cards in each player's hand.

Card.name: Face Crush
Card.Property: You may pay 1 energy to have this attack do +X damage. X = the damage the previous attack in this combo dealt, to a max of +4.

Card.name: Face Jab
Card.Property: HIT - You may pay 1 energy to keep your rival from playing low attacks in his next action.

Card.name: Fire Fists
Card.Property: HIT - If your rival blocks your next attack in this combo, you may return it to your hand instead of putting it into your energy pile.

Card.name: Gloves of Steel
Card.Property: If played by Dudley or Balrog, punches can link from this attack. (*) HIT - Discard the top card of your rival's deck for each of your face-down cards in the arena, to a max of 3.

Card.name: Grab and Throw
Card.Property: Your rival must discard one of his face-down cards in the arena before he can block this attack.

Card.name: Handstand Whip
Card.Property: HIT - You may put the projectile closest to the top of your discard pile on top of your deck.

Card.name: Head Kick
Card.Property: If played in a combo that included a weapon attack, your rival puts a card from his hand on top of his deck.

Card.name: Hurricane Kicks
Card.Property: HIT - Put the bottom 3 cards of your discard pile at the bottom of your deck.

Card.name: Inside Jab
Card.Property: HIT - Your next attack in this combo does +2 damage.

Card.name: Jump Kick
Card.Property: If played as the 3rd or higher attack in a combo, discard the top 2 cards of your rival's deck.

Card.name: Jumping Punch
Card.Property: When your rival blocks this attack and he has 2 or less energy, he discards the top 2 cards of his deck.

Card.name: Ki Charge
Card.Property: If played by Ryu, this attack can link as a projectile and may have a projectile follow up.

Card.name: Kubi-jime Katagurama
Card.Property: HIT - Your rival must pay an extra 2 energy before he can block the next attack in this combo.

Card.name: Leaping Kick
Card.Property: When an event is damaged by an attack in this combo, you may put that attack on top of your deck instead of your energy pile.

Card.name: Muay Thai Leap
Card.Property: Your rival's high attacks in his next action do -1 damage for each throw in your energy pile, to a max of -2.

Card.name: Multi-Kicks
Card.Property: HIT - Put the bottom card of your discard pile at the bottom of your deck.

Card.name: Neck Breaker
Card.Property: HIT - Put the top 2 cards of your discard pile at the bottom of your deck.

Card.name: Overpowered Ki
Card.Property: Discard one of your face-down events in the arena to discard the top 3 cards of your rival's deck.

Card.name: Push
Card.Property: Lower the damage of your rival's first attack in his next action by the amount of damage this attack deals.

Card.name: Quick Strikes
Card.Property: HIT - Anytime you play another attack in this combo, put the bottom card of your discard pile at the bottom of your deck.

Card.name: Rapid Wrists
Card.Property: HIT - Draw a card if you have a kick in your energy pile.

Card.name: Rising Gut Kick
Card.Property: HIT - Your rival takes 3 random cards from his hand and puts them at the bottom of his deck and draws 1 card for each card put there from this effect.

Card.name: Strong Throw
Card.Property: HIT - The first time your cards are damaged during your rival's next action, put any damaged throws at the bottom of your deck.

Card.name: Strongman Slam
Card.Property: HIT - If your rival blocks the next attack in this combo, he takes +X chipping. That attack cannot have its damage modified. X = half the attack's damage, rounded up.

Card.name: Test of Strength
Card.Property: HIT - Put up to 3 throws in your hand at the bottom of your deck and draw the same number of cards.

Card.name: Tiger Shot
Card.Property: Your rival must reveal a 2nd block from his hand without playing it before he can block this attack. (*)HIT - Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Set any events and put the rest at the bottom of your deck.

Card.name: Tiger Uppercut
Card.Property: You may play this card to block a high attack.

Card.name: Universal Overhead
Card.Property: Discard the top card of your deck. If it can link from this card, play it.

Card.name: Violent Knee Drop
Card.Property: HIT - When you play another attack in this combo, end this step when that attack finishes.

Card.name: Backstab
Card.Property: HIT - Your rival keeps - 2 cards in his hand during this turn's Discard.

Card.name: Ballroom Blitz
Card.Property: Damage from this attack and any other attacks in this combo cannot be lowered.

Card.name: Body Kick
Card.Property: HIT - If linked from a throw, put 3 throws from your discard pile at the bottom of your deck.

Card.name: Close Knee
Card.Property: If you have exactly 2 energy, this attack does +3 damage.

Card.name: Hitting the Weak Spot
Card.Property: HIT - Your rival cannot play high attacks in his next action.

Card.name: Palm Thrust
Card.Property: When your rival takes chipping during this combo, he takes double that amount.

Card.name: Gekirou
Card.Property: HIT - If your next attack in this combo hits, that attack deals no damage. Put X cards from the bottom of your discard pile at the bottom of your deck instead. X = the damage that attack would have dealt.

Card.name: Sharp Edge
Card.Property: HIT - If your rival has more cards in his hand than you, he discards a card from his hand.

Card.name: Shocking!
Card.Property: HIT - The next attack in this combo can be played from the top of your discard pile if it can link from this attack.

Card.name: Sumo Tackle
Card.Property: Discard up to X cards from the top of your deck to discard the same number of cards from the top of your rival's deck. X = the number of punches in your energy pile.

Card.name: Zanku Hadouken
Card.Property: Your rival must pay +1 energy to block this attack for each throw in your energy pile.

Card.name: Aerial Stuff
Card.Property: If this blocks a kick, remove up to 3 cards in your rival's discard pile.

Card.name: Duck
Card.Property: If you have a kick in your energy pile, put the bottom 2 cards of your discard pile at the bottom of your deck.

Card.name: High Impact Stop
Card.Property: Your rival's effects cannot discard from your deck or increase damage this step.

Card.name: Iron Defense
Card.Property: If this card blocks a throw, the costs of your other cards this step cannot be modified.

Card.name: Back Bend
Card.Property: If this blocks a weapon, your attacks chip +2 this turn.

Card.name: Projectile Reflection
Card.Property: If this blocks a projectile, your rival's action ends after this attack finishes.

Card.name: Weight Shift
Card.Property: Your throws cost -1 energy this step.

Card.name: Elena
Card.Property: Your punches are kicks. (*) Once per attack, when you link from or into a kick during a combo, put the bottom card of your discards at the bottom of your deck.

Card.name: Gill
Card.Property: All your attacks that cost 1 or more do +2 damage. (*) When you finish a combo of 3 or more attacks, draw a card.

Card.name: Hugo
Card.Property: When a throw is damaged from your deck and you have less than 8 energy, put it into your energy pile. (*) When your first attack in an action is a throw, you may pay X energy to have it do +X damage. (*) Your deck may have 10 extra cards.

Card.name: Dark Magic
Card.Property: Flip when you attack. It takes 2 blocks to block this attack. This attack's damage cannot be lowered.

Card.name: Elena's Healing
Card.Property: Flip as an action in Battle. Put the bottom 12 cards of your discard pile at the bottom of your deck in any order. Remove this card.

Card.name: Gill's Resurrection
Card.Property: Flip when you would lose a round. Shuffle your discard pile into your deck. The round is not over. Remove this card. (*) Limit 1 per deck.

Card.name: The Dark Hadou
Card.Property: RYU, KEN AND AKUMA ONLY. (*) Flip at the start of Battle. Your attacks do +2 damage this step.

Card.name: What a Combo!
Card.Property: Flip after you finish a combo. End this step. (*) Limit 1 per deck.

Card.name: Alex's Boomerang Raid
Card.Property: Put a throw from your discard pile into your hand. You can only play 1 more attack in this combo.

Card.name: Alex's Hyper Bomb
Card.Property: Your rival must pay 3 energy and discard 2 cards from his hand before he can block this attack.

Card.name: Dudley's Corkscrew Blow
Card.Property: Set 2 events from your discard pile that do not draw cards.

Card.name: Dudley's Rocket Uppercut
Card.Property: HIT - Put up to 10 events from your discard pile on top of your deck in any order.

Card.name: Gill's Seraphic Wing
Card.Property: Discard the top 10 cards of your rival's deck.

Card.name: Hugo's Megaton Press
Card.Property: HIT - You may search and discard up to 4 cards from your deck as damage and then shuffle your deck.

Card.name: Ibuki's Kasumi Suzaku
Card.Property: HIT - Your rival discards 2 random cards from his hand.

Card.name: Ibuki's Yoroi Doshi
Card.Property: You may change this attack to a projectile when you play it. (*) HIT - All players discard their hands.

Card.name: Ken's Shippu Jinraikyaku
Card.Property: Put this card on top of your deck after it finishes instead of your energy pile.

Card.name: Ken's Shoryu Reppa
Card.Property: Discard all of your rival's face-down cards in the arena.

Card.name: Ryu's Shin Shoryuken
Card.Property: HIT - Choose any attacks in your energy pile without "Ryu" in the title and use the text on those cards except for their "HIT -" texts.

Card.name: Sean's Hyper Tornado
Card.Property: HIT - Discard all your rival's energy.

Card.name: Super Assault
Card.Property: HIT - Switch a card in your discard pile that has a character's name in the title with a card in your hand.

Card.name: Twelve's X.C.O.P.Y.
Card.Property: Search your rival's deck for any attack and play it at no cost instead of this one. When it finishes, discard it into your rival's discard pile and put this card into your energy pile. Link from your rival's card.

Card.name: Crouching Fierce Kick
Card.Property: HIT - When you link from this attack, you may pay an extra energy to keep it in the arena to be played 1 extra time. The final time it is played, or when the step ends, remove it.

Card.name: Elena's Brave Dance
Card.Property: Draw the bottom card of your deck. (*) HIT - Draw the bottom card of your deck. (*) Remove this card.

Card.name: Kunai Dart
Card.Property: HIT - Discard a card in your rival's energy pile. Put a card in your rival's discard pile into his energy pile.

Card.name: Lunging Sweep
Card.Property: If you have more energy than your rival, this attack stays in the arena to be played a second time this step. If the step ends while it is in the arena, discard it.

Card.name: Ryu's Shinku Hadoken
Card.Property: The first time this card is played, choose 2 attacks in your energy pile without "Ryu's" in the title and use the texts on those cards except for "HIT -" texts.

Card.name: Sean Tackle
Card.Property: HIT - Discard a card in your rival's energy pile.

Card.name: Tag Team
Card.Property: The first event flipped with this attack is flipped face-down instead of discarded and cannot be flipped again this turn.

Card.name: Twelve's X.N.D.L.
Card.Property: Set an event from your discard pile for each weapon in your energy pile.

Card.name: Amazing Defense
Card.Property: STREET FIGHTER ONLY. (*) Block all of your rival's low attacks this step. Remove this card. (*) Limit 1 per deck.

Card.name: Capcom Team Up
Card.Property: STREET FIGHTER ONLY. (*) You may pay 1 energy to have this card stay in the arena to be played a second time this step. Discard this card the second time you play it, or when this step ends.

Card.name: Fighting the Darkness
Card.Property: Flip when you attack. Put an attack with the same attack trait from your discard pile into your hand. Remove this card. (*) Limit 1 per deck.

Card.name: Information Gathering
Card.Property: STREET FIGHTER ONLY. Flip at the start of Set. Search your deck for 2 events, reveal them and set them. (*) Limit 1 per deck.

Card.name: Jab
Card.Property: While in your energy pile at the end of Battle, you may put a card with "Jab" in the title from your energy pile into your hand.

Card.name: Flying Peach
Card.Property: HIT - The next kick in this combo can be played out of your energy pile. You cannot discard that attack to pay for itself.

Card.name: Evil Ryu
Card.Property: (Counts as Ryu.) When you attack, you may discard one of your face-down cards in the arena to search your deck for The Dark Hadou and set and flip it immediatelly at no cost.

Card.name: Deep Injury
Card.Property: Flip when you attack, all damage and chipping from this attack, and others in this combo are removed.

Card.name: Perfect Pose
Card.Property: Flip when you attack. You may put that attack on top of your deck after it finishes. Remove this card.

Card.name: Interpol Agent
Card.Property: Flip when your Rival reveals his hand (*) Choose and discard a card from that hand.

Card.name: Super Leap
Card.Property: Flip when you attack. Discard an attack from your hand to discard an attack with the same attack trait in you rival's energy pile. If this happens, put a card from his discard pile into his energy pile.

Card.name: Gouken
Card.Property: Your attacks do +1 damage. You may hold +1 card in your hand during Discard.

Card.name: Evil Reborn
Card.Property: Flip at the start of Battle. Discard a projectile from your hand to stop all effects that modify the costs of your attacks this step.

Card.name: Recovery
Card.Property: Flip when an effect puts cards from your discard pile into your deck. Double the amount. Remove this card.
